meanings.definition: The state of being controlled by a spirit or demon.
meanings.sent1: Her possessedness by the evil spirit caused her to act strangely.
meanings.sent2: The possessedness of the haunted house scared the visitors away.
meanings.sent3: His possessedness by the ghost made him the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: The possessedness of the old mansion gave it an eerie atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The possessedness of the doll in the horror movie was truly terrifying.

meanings.definition: The quality of owning or having something.
meanings.sent1: The possessedness of the rare gem made it highly valuable.
meanings.sent2: His possessedness of the antique car collection was well-known.
meanings.sent3: The possessedness of the family heirloom brought pride to the siblings.
meanings.sent4: The possessedness of the valuable painting was evident in the museum.
meanings.sent5: Her possessedness of the precious necklace was evident in her careful handling.

meanings.definition: The state of being obsessed or consumed by a feeling or idea.
meanings.sent1: His possessedness with finding the treasure consumed all his thoughts.
meanings.sent2: The possessedness of the detective with solving the case led to breakthroughs.
meanings.sent3: Her possessedness with organizing her books led to a perfectly arranged shelf.
meanings.sent4: The possessedness of the artist with perfection resulted in a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: Their possessedness with winning the championship drove them to train harder.
